text: @realDonaldTrump President Trump, when reporters ask you, “Why you are promoting Hydrochloriquin”- why don’t you ASK THEM - What if your mother, father, or child were sick or dying with COVID-19 would you Not Allow the doctor to give this med to that loved one???
